repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: U.S. Department of Justice, Mails and Files Division, General Records Files #23-34-14, Section 1 on Microfilm
did.abstract: Several letters regarding a case against a group of men in Williamson County, Illinois - accused of posing as Government Officers.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of several letters regarding a case against a group of men in Williamson County, Illinois - accused of posing as Government Officers.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: U.S. Department of Justice, Mails and Files Division, General Records Files #23-34-14, Section 1 on Microfilm #5178 mf. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5113: Ralph T. Seward Additional Arbitration Files 5779: Ralph T. Seward Additional Arbitration Files 5780/203: ILGWU Jay Mazur Papers 5863 mf: Department of Justice Investigative Files on Industrial Workers of the World, Part 1 on Microfilm 5897 mf: Strike Files of the U.S. Department of Justice, Pt. 1 on Microfilm 5940 mf: International Workers Order's Immigration and Naturalization Files on Microfilm 5970: Ralph Seward Additional Papers 6000/024 MB: UNITE Local 23-25 Memorabilia 6030: Archival Collective Bargaining Agreements File 6047: Archives Information File 6074 mf: Records of the Immigration and Naturalization Service, Series A, Subject Correspondence Files. Part 2, 3, & 4 on Microfilm 6440: Ralph T. Seward Collections 6454: Industrial Workers of the World Collections
